selected_quotes: As rainfall patterns shift, technological and legislative changes are needed to address water shortages
#Science News: “There is simply not enough fresh #water for everybody to use as much as they want.” #drought
The reality is that there is simply not enough fresh water for everybody to use as much as they want -
In the current Nature, #Water politics must #adapt to a warming world, #waterpricing

blogs.title: Speed blogging

wikipedia.title: Water politics
wikipedia.summary: Water politics, sometimes called hydropolitics, is politics affected by the availability of water and water resources, a necessity for all life forms and human development.
